basics.name: Jordan Smith
basics.label: Marketing Specialist
basics.summary: Marketing professional with 5+ years of experience in content strategy, digital campaigns, and SEO. Transitioning into product marketing with a focus on growth and analytics.

work.summary: Led content marketing strategy for B2B SaaS clients and increased qualified lead volume by 27%.
highlights: Created and optimized over 50 SEO-driven landing pages
Launched a lead magnet campaign that captured 3,000+ new leads
Managed a team of 3 writers and freelancers

work.summary: Managed paid ad campaigns and tracked performance analytics across social platforms.
highlights: Reduced CPC by 18% through strategic A/B testing
Increased email open rates by 22% through segmentation
